color: #000000;">V&ugrave;ng lưu trữ dữ liệu trong Android</span></li> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><span color="#0000ff" style="color: #000000;">C&aacute;ch đọc/ghi dữ liệu trong c&aacute;c ph&acirc;n v&ugrave;ng của Android</span></li> <li style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="color: #000000;">C&aacute;c kiến thức li&ecirc;n quan đến việc tối ưu khi sử dụng dữ liệu</span></li> </ul> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Link t&agrave;i liệu:</strong></p> <ul style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><a href="https://developer.android.com/training/data-storage/app-specific" target="_blank" style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; transition: color 0.25s ease-in-out 0s; text-decoration-line: none; color: #009fe6;">Lưu trữ dữ liệu trong Android</a>&nbsp;<span style="color: #000000;">(xem bản dịch hỗ trợ</span> <a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ohD8xppoy6a2yYpteUE5CA8BIVT7rzO8/view" target="_blank">tại đ&acirc;y</a><span style="color: #000000;">)</span></li> </ul> <div id="eJOY__extension_root" class="eJOY__extension_root_class" style="all: unset;"></div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-vertical" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="VerticalStudentView" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7" data-request-token="f698f0ee297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@2bdc58a35de0474088a8c0490389ac9d" data-block-type="vertical"> <h2 class="hd hd-2 unit-title">Lab 7.1 - Xây dựng giao diện download file</h2> <div class="bookmark-button-wrapper"> <button class="btn btn-link bookmark-button " aria-pressed="false" data-bookmark-id="kiendtFX07130,block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@2bdc58a35de0474088a8c0490389ac9d" data-bookmarks-api-url="/api/bookmarks/v1/bookmarks/"> <span class="bookmark-text">Bookmark this page</span> </button> </div> <div class="vert-mod"> <div class="vert vert-0" data-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@d1c404e3b80d480099c298b32c0cfbbb"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-html xmodule_display xmodule_HtmlModule" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="html" data-request-token="f698f0ee297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@d1c404e3b80d480099c298b32c0cfbbb" data-type="HTMLModule" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "HTMLModule"} </script> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">I. Phạm vi kiến thức vận dụng<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></p> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c kiến thức căn bản về Design UI </span></b></span></li> <ul> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Drawable</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Color Schemes</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">String constants</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Style &amp; themes</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Layout constraint rules (padding, margin&hellip;)</span></span></li> </ul> </ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c đối tượng View System</span></b></span></li> <ul> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">TextView, ImageView</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c ViewGroup gồm:&nbsp;</span></span>LinearLayout, FrameLayout, TableRow</li> </ul> </ul> </ul> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">II. Nội dung b&agrave;i thực h&agrave;nh<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">1. Y&ecirc;u cầu:</span></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"> </span></b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Tạo 1 ứng dụng </span><span lang="VI" style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Downloader</span><span lang="VI" style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"> </span></span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">v&agrave; x&acirc;y dựng giao diện layout sau</span><o:p></o:p></span></p> <table class="MsoTableGrid" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border: none;" width="790" height="380"> <tbody> <tr> <td width="252" valign="top" style="width: 189.0pt; padding: 0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;"> <p><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%208%2F%E1%BA%A2nh%2016.png?alt=media&amp;token=adc64a4f-827f-46dc-b408-9727e26c6609" alt="File preview" /></p> </td> <td width="371" valign="top" style="width: 278.5pt; padding: 0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;"> <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: .0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt;">M&ocirc; tả:</span></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt;"> </span></b><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Đ&acirc;y l&agrave; 1 giao diện hiển thị </span><span lang="VI" style="font-size: 12pt;">&ocirc; nhập</span><span style="font-size: 12pt;"> link để download file, sau khi download th&agrave;nh c&ocirc;ng, c&oacute; thể mở được file đ&oacute; l&ecirc;n.<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: .0001pt; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Y&ecirc;u cầu giao diện:<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></span></p> <p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst" style="mso-add-space: auto; text-indent: -.25in; line-height: normal; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo2; margin: 0in 0in .0001pt 23.55pt;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">C&oacute; progressbar b&ecirc;n dưới &ocirc; nhập link download<b><o:p></o:p></b></span></span></p> <p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpLast" style="mso-add-space: auto; text-indent: -.25in; line-height: normal; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo2; margin: 0in 0in .0001pt 23.55pt;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; line-height: 107%;">2. Gợi &yacute;</span></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">: </span></b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c kiến thức sử dụng:<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Tạo 1 layout <b>xml</b> trong thư mục res/layout<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Sử dụng c&aacute;c ViewSystem:&nbsp;</span></span>TextView, ProgressBar</p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Sử dụng c&aacute;c ViewGroup:&nbsp;</span></span>LinearLayout hoặc FrameLayout</p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">3. mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: blue; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;">:id</span><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: green; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;">="@+id/bt_open"<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;">android</span><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; </span><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; line-height: 107%;">. Lưu &yacute;:</span></b></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c bạn ho&agrave;n to&agrave;n c&oacute; thể sử dụng layout ch&iacute;nh l&agrave; <b>RelativeLayout </b>để x&acirc;y dựng giao diện b&agrave;i n&agrave;y nh&eacute;.</span></span></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Thời gian dự kiến ho&agrave;n th&agrave;nh b&agrave;i n&agrave;y</strong>:&nbsp;<strong>30</strong><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">&nbsp;ph&uacute;t</strong></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><em style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Lưu &yacute;:</strong>&nbsp;Bạn h&atilde;y lưu kết quả lab tr&ecirc;n m&aacute;y t&iacute;nh c&aacute; nh&acirc;n để chuẩn bị cho buổi review sau n&agrave;y. Lưu &yacute; Học vi&ecirc;n cần ho&agrave;n th&agrave;nh tất cả c&aacute;c b&agrave;i lab của m&ocirc;n học mới tiến h&agrave;nh đăng k&yacute; review.</em></p> <div id="eJOY__extension_root" class="eJOY__extension_root_class" style="all: unset;"></div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-vertical" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="VerticalStudentView" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7" data-request-token="f698f0ee297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@747f1101e3234dd4a3783332d6f0174f" data-block-type="vertical"> <h2 class="hd hd-2 unit-title">Lab 7.2 - Thực hiện xử lý download file và lưu trong DataStorage</h2> <div class="bookmark-button-wrapper"> <button class="btn btn-link bookmark-button " aria-pressed="false" data-bookmark-id="kiendtFX07130,block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@747f1101e3234dd4a3783332d6f0174f" data-bookmarks-api-url="/api/bookmarks/v1/bookmarks/"> <span class="bookmark-text">Bookmark this page</span> </button> </div> <div class="vert-mod"> <div class="vert vert-0" data-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@01faabe7cd6d4c9fa7536446b96cda0b"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-html xmodule_display xmodule_HtmlModule" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="html" data-request-token="f698f0ee297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@01faabe7cd6d4c9fa7536446b96cda0b" data-type="HTMLModule" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "HTMLModule"} </script> <p><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">I. Phạm vi kiến thức vận dụng</span></b></p> <ul> <li><strong><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Tiếp nối b&agrave;i Lab 7.1 </span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">- X&acirc;y dựng giao diện download file</span></span></strong></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c kiến thức về logic:</span></b></span></li> <ul> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Activity</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">OnClickListener</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Intent</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">User permission</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Thread</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Provider: tham khảo <a href="https://viblo.asia/p/android-content-provider-p2-implement-chia-se-du-lieu-giua-2-hoac-nhieu-ung-dung-V3m5WoQb5O7" target="_blank">tại đ&acirc;y</a>.</span></span></li> </ul> </ul> </ul> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">II. Nội dung b&agrave;i thực h&agrave;nh<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">1. Y&ecirc;u cầu:</span></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"> </span></b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Tạo 1 ứng dụng </span><span lang="VI" style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Downloader</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"> v&agrave; x&acirc;y dựng giao diện layout sau:<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <table class="MsoTableGrid" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border: none;"> <tbody> <tr> <td width="252" valign="top" style="width: 189.0pt; padding: 0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%208%2F%E1%BA%A2nh%2017.png?alt=media&amp;token=052e4de2-2e6c-4d6e-943a-31aca915190c" alt="File preview" /></td> <td width="371" valign="top" style="width: 278.5pt; padding: 0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;"> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt;">M&ocirc; tả:</span></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt;"> </span></b><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Đ&acirc;y l&agrave; 1 giao diện hiển thị </span><span lang="VI" style="font-size: 12pt;">&ocirc; nhập</span><span style="font-size: 12pt;"> link để download file, sau khi download th&agrave;nh c&ocirc;ng, c&oacute; thể mở được file đ&oacute; l&ecirc;n.<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Y&ecirc;u cầu giao diện:<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">C&oacute; progressbar b&ecirc;n dưới &ocirc; nhập link download</span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><b><o:p></o:p></b></span></span> <span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Thiết kế giao diện như h&igrave;nh m&ocirc; tả</span></span></p> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">2. Gợi &yacute;</span></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">: </span></b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c kiến thức sử dụng:<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"><font size="1">&nbsp;</font></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Tạo 1 layout <b>xml</b> trong thư mục res/layout<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-</span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"><font size="1">&nbsp;</font></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Sử dụng c&aacute;c ViewSystem:<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">o<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">TextView, ProgressBar<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Sử dụng c&aacute;c ViewGroup:<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">o<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span><!--[endif]--></span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">LinearLayout hoặc FrameLayout</span><o:p></o:p></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">3. Hướng dẫn triển khai code logic trong activity <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Bước 1:</span></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"> </span></b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">&nbsp;Viết m&atilde; cho file <b>AndroidManifest.xml<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Khai b&aacute;o quyền người d&ugrave;ng trong Android Manifest<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <ul> <ul> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Đọc ghi bộ nhớ</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Truy cập internet để download File</span></span></li> </ul> </ul> </ul> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Y&ecirc;u cầu quyền người d&ugrave;ng để c&oacute; thể truy cập bộ nhớ để đọc/ghi file<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Xử l&yacute; click v&agrave;o c&aacute;c button download, open để tải file, mở file.<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Sử dụng Thread để việc truy cập v&agrave; download file tối ưu hơn.<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Sử dụng Intent để mở file sau khi tải.</span><o:p></o:p></span></p> <table class="MsoTableGrid" border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="630" style="width: 472.25pt; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">== </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">|| </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">savePath</span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">.isEmpty()) </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; File file = </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">new </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">);<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">this</span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">ACTION_VIEW</span></i></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; </span><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">[] buff = </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">len = in.read(buff);<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; runOnUiThread(() -&gt; {<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">.setProgress(</span><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: blue;">0</span><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">);<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">btOpen</span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">.setEnabled(</span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">false</span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">);<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; });<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">size </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">= </span><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: blue;">0</span><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">;<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">while </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">(len &gt; </span><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: blue;">0</span><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">) {<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; out.write(buff, </span><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: blue;">0</span><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">, len);<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">size </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">+= len;<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; runOnUiThread(() -&gt; </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">progressBar</span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">.setProgress(</span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">size</span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">));<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; len = in.read(buff);<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; out.close();<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; in.close();<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; runOnUiThread(() -&gt; </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">btOpen</span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">.setEnabled(</span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">));<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; } </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">catch </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">(Exception e) {<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; e.printStackTrace();<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; runOnUiThread(() -&gt; Toast.<i>makeText</i>(MainActivity.</span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">this</span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">, </span><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">e</span><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">LENGTH_SHORT</span></i></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; }<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }.start();<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br /> }<o:p></o:p></span></pre> <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: .0001pt; Lưu &yacute;:</span></b></span></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; được cấp hay chưa:</span></span></span></p> <table class="MsoTableGrid" border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="margin-left: 0.5in; border: none;"> <tbody> <tr> <td width="623" valign="top" style="width: 467.5pt; </span><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; </span><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">,<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Manifest.permission.</span><b><i><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; </span></i></b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">);<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin;"><o:p></o:p></span></b></p> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"><br />-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Phương thức để download file</span><b><o:p></o:p></b></span></p> <table class="MsoTableGrid" border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="margin-left: 0.5in; border: none;"> <tbody> <tr style="mso-yfti-irow: 0; mso-yfti-firstrow: yes; mso-yfti-lastrow: yes; height: 44.5pt;"> <td width="623" valign="top" style="width: 467.5pt; border-width: 1pt; border-color: windowtext; padding: 0in 5.4pt; height: 44.5pt;"> <pre style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">private void </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">downloadFile(String link) {<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">(Exception e) {<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; e.printStackTrace();<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; runOnUiThread(() -&gt; Toast.<i>makeText</i>(MainActivity.</span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">this</span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">, </span><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">e</span><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">.getMessage(), Toast.</span><b><i><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">LENGTH_SHORT</span></i></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">).show());<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }.start();<br /> }<o:p></o:p></span></pre> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> <p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin;"><span style="font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Phương thức để mở file sau khi tải:</span></span></p> <table class="MsoTableGrid" border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="margin-left: 0.5in; border: none;"> <tbody> <tr style="mso-yfti-irow: 0; mso-yfti-firstrow: yes; mso-yfti-lastrow: yes; height: 30.1pt;"> <td width="575" valign="top" style="width: 431.5pt; border-width: 1pt; border-color: windowtext; padding: 0in 5.4pt; height: 30.1pt;"> <pre style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">private void </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">openFile() {<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">if </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">(</span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">savePath </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">== </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">null </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">|| </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">savePath</span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">.isEmpty()) </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">return</span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">;<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; File file = </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">new </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">File(</span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">savePath</span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">);<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Uri uri = FileProvider.<i>getUriForFile</i>(</span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">this</span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">, getPackageName() + </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: green;">".provider"</span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">, file);<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; String mime = getContentResolver().getType(uri);<br /> <br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Intent intent = </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">new </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">Intent();<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; intent.setAction(Intent.</span><b><i><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">ACTION_VIEW</span></i></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">);<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; intent.setDataAndType(uri, mime);<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; intent.addFlags(Intent.</span><b><i><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">FLAG_GRANT_READ_URI_PERMISSION</span></i></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">);<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; startActivity(intent);<br /> }<o:p></o:p></span></pre> <p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt; mso-add-space: auto; line-height: normal;"><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin;">&nbsp;</span></b></p> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><br />Thời gian dự kiến ho&agrave;n th&agrave;nh b&agrave;i n&agrave;y</strong>:&nbsp;<strong>30</strong><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">&nbsp;ph&uacute;t</strong></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><em style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Lưu &yacute;:</strong>&nbsp;Bạn h&atilde;y lưu kết quả lab tr&ecirc;n m&aacute;y t&iacute;nh c&aacute; nh&acirc;n để chuẩn bị cho buổi review sau n&agrave;y. Lưu &yacute; Học vi&ecirc;n cần ho&agrave;n th&agrave;nh tất cả c&aacute;c b&agrave;i lab của m&ocirc;n học mới tiến h&agrave;nh đăng k&yacute; review.</em></p> <div id="eJOY__extension_root" class="eJOY__extension_root_class" style="all: unset;"></div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-vertical" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="VerticalStudentView" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7" data-request-token="f698f0ee297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@449f9821d528494fa144d5e1c249b9e8" data-block-type="vertical"> <h2 class="hd hd-2 unit-title">Lab 7.3 - Xây dựng giao diện đăng nhập/đăng ký</h2> <div class="bookmark-button-wrapper"> <button class="btn btn-link bookmark-button " aria-pressed="false" data-bookmark-id="kiendtFX07130,block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@449f9821d528494fa144d5e1c249b9e8" data-bookmarks-api-url="/api/bookmarks/v1/bookmarks/"> <span class="bookmark-text">Bookmark this page</span> </button> </div> <div class="vert-mod"> <div class="vert vert-0" data-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@01c3eae6354c48d593b41a0216804935"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-html xmodule_display xmodule_HtmlModule" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="html" data-request-token="f698f0ee297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@01c3eae6354c48d593b41a0216804935" data-type="HTMLModule" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "HTMLModule"} </script> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">I. Phạm vi kiến thức vận dụng<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></p> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c kiến thức căn bản về Design UI </span></b></span></li> <ul> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Drawable, Color Schemes, String constants, Style &amp; themes</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Layout constraint rules (padding, margin&hellip;)</span></span></li> </ul> </ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c đối tượng View System<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></li> <ul> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">TextView, EditText, Button, ImageView</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c ViewGroup gồm:&nbsp;</span></span>LinearLayout, FrameLayout, TableRow</li> </ul> </ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c đối tượng xử l&yacute; logic</span></b></span></li> <ul> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Activity, Fragment</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">SharedPreference</span></span></li> </ul> </ul> </ul> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">II. Nội dung b&agrave;i thực h&agrave;nh<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">1. Y&ecirc;u cầu:</span></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"> </span></b></span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Tạo 1 ứng dụng <b>Account</b> v&agrave; x&acirc;y dựng giao diện layout sau</span><o:p></o:p></span></p> <p class="MsoNormal"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%208%2F%E1%BA%A2nh%2018.png?alt=media&amp;token=98be8e76-7133-4b41-afa6-58ebb00ba45d" alt="File preview" /><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%208%2F%E1%BA%A2nh%2019.png?alt=media&amp;token=5f93c102-2cf7-477b-b06c-b5258c3034f0" alt="File preview" /></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">M&ocirc; tả:</span></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"> </span></b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Đ&acirc;y l&agrave; 1 giao diện hiển thị th&ocirc;ng tin đăng nhập/đăng k&yacute;<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Y&ecirc;u cầu bắt buộc:<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Kh&ocirc;ng c&oacute; ActionBar<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c &ocirc; nhập, n&uacute;t login sẽ được bo tr&ograve;n<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Phần icon sử dụng ảnh vector assets<b><o:p></o:p></b></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Thiết kế tương đối ch&iacute;nh x&aacute;c với tỷ lệ c&aacute;c khung giao diện như ảnh</span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">2. Gợi &yacute;</span></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">: </span></b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c kiến thức sử dụng:<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Tạo 1 layout <b>xml</b> trong thư mục res/layout<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Sử dụng c&aacute;c ViewSystem:<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <ul> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">TextView</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">ImageView</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">View</span></span></li> </ul> </ul> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Sử dụng c&aacute;c ViewGroup:<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <ul> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">LinearLayout<o:p></o:p></span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">RelativeLayout</span></span></li> </ul> </ul> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Sử dụng <b>vector</b> drawable để lấy ảnh icon phone v&agrave; email trong bộ resource của Android Studio đ&atilde; t&iacute;ch hợp sẵn:</span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%208%2F%E1%BA%A2nh%2021.png?alt=media&amp;token=22ad1413-e0a3-45ae-8147-866294194e36" alt="File preview" />&nbsp; bold;">LinearLayout </span><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: green; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;">="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: blue; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;">android:id</span><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: blue; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;">android:layout_width</span><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: green; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;">="match_parent"<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;">="match_parent"<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: blue; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;">android:orientation</span><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: green; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;">="vertical"</span><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">&gt;<br /> <br /> &lt;/</span><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;
