107%;">4. Lưu &yacute;:</span></b></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">C&aacute;c bạn ho&agrave;n to&agrave;n c&oacute; thể sử dụng layout ch&iacute;nh l&agrave; <b>RelativeLayout </b>để x&acirc;y dựng giao diện b&agrave;i n&agrave;y</span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Tham khảo c&aacute;ch thiết kế giao diện bằng c&ocirc;ng cụ Figma: </span><a href="https://www.figma.com" target="_blank"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">https://www.figma.com</span></a></span><b><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin;"><o:p></o:p></span></b></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Thời gian dự kiến ho&agrave;n th&agrave;nh b&agrave;i n&agrave;y</strong>:&nbsp;<strong>30</strong><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">&nbsp;ph&uacute;t</strong></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><em style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Lưu &yacute;:</strong>&nbsp;Bạn h&atilde;y lưu kết quả lab tr&ecirc;n m&aacute;y t&iacute;nh c&aacute; nh&acirc;n để chuẩn bị cho buổi review sau n&agrave;y. Lưu &yacute; Học vi&ecirc;n cần ho&agrave;n th&agrave;nh tất cả c&aacute;c b&agrave;i lab của m&ocirc;n học mới tiến h&agrave;nh đăng k&yacute; review.</em></p> <div id="eJOY__extension_root" class="eJOY__extension_root_class" style="all: unset;"></div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-vertical" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="VerticalStudentView" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7" data-request-token="f698f0ee297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@33bd2a1895ff4047ba2a3ab8817fc040" data-block-type="vertical"> <h2 class="hd hd-2 unit-title">Lab 7.4 - Thực hiện xử lý logic đăng ký/đăng nhập bằng SharePreference</h2> <div class="bookmark-button-wrapper"> <button class="btn btn-link bookmark-button " aria-pressed="false" data-bookmark-id="kiendtFX07130,block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@33bd2a1895ff4047ba2a3ab8817fc040" data-bookmarks-api-url="/api/bookmarks/v1/bookmarks/"> <span class="bookmark-text">Bookmark this page</span> </button> </div> <div class="vert-mod"> <div class="vert vert-0" data-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@509f42de8d8746d98447910b0d06bf2f"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-html xmodule_display xmodule_HtmlModule" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="html" data-request-token="f698f0ee297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@509f42de8d8746d98447910b0d06bf2f" data-type="HTMLModule" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "HTMLModule"} </script> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">I. Phạm vi kiến thức vận dụng<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></p> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Nối tiếp b&agrave;i&nbsp;Lab 7.3 - X&acirc;y dựng giao diện đăng nhập đăng k&yacute;</span></span></li> </ul> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">II. Nội dung b&agrave;i thực h&agrave;nh<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">1. Y&ecirc;u cầu:</span></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"> </span></b></span><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Tạo 1 ứng dụng <b>Account</b> v&agrave; x&acirc;y dựng giao diện layout sau</span><o:p></o:p></span></p> <p class="MsoNormal"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%208%2F%E1%BA%A2nh%2024.png?alt=media&amp;token=ab56b854-5ad5-496b-8460-ef7b5b1cf79f" alt="File preview" /><b><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-way.appspot.com/o/SE20%2FPRM391x_03-A_VN%2FB%C3%A0i%208%2F%E1%BA%A2nh%2025.png?alt=media&amp;token=d457f2f1-8178-4d8c-8254-2cd3103bddbf" alt="File preview" /></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">M&ocirc; tả:</span></span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"> </span></b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Đ&acirc;y l&agrave; 1 giao diện hiển thị th&ocirc;ng tin đăng nhập/đăng k&yacute;<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">2. X&acirc;y dựng đối tượng xử l&yacute; logic<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Y&ecirc;u cầu bắt buộc:<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Hiển thị c&aacute;c m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh giao diện bằng Fragment<o:p></o:p></span></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Thực hiện lưu trữ dữ liệu bằng SharedPreference</span></span></p> <p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpLast" style="margin-left: 23.55pt; mso-add-space: auto; text-indent: -.25in; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo2;"><b><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Bước 1:</span></span></b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;"> X&acirc;y dựng đối tượng M000LoginFragment để hiển thị giao diện m000_frg_login</span></p> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Hiển thị giao diện login</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Xử l&yacute; logic đăng nhập</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Di chuyển đến m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh đăng k&yacute;</span></span></li> </ul> <table class="MsoTableGrid" border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border: none;"> <tbody> <tr> <td width="623" valign="top" style="width: 467.5pt; gotoRegisterScreen();<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br /> <br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">com.techja.account;<br /> <br /> </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">android.os.Bundle;<br /> <br /> </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">import </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity;<br /> <br /> </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">public class </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">MainActivity </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">extends </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">AppCompatActivity {<br /> <br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">public static final </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">String </span><b><i><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">SAVE_PREF </span></i></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">= </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: green;">"save_pref"</span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">;<br /> <br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: olive;">@Override<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">protected void </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">super</span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">.onCreate(savedInstanceState);<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; setContentView(R.layout.</span><b><i><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">activity_main</span></i></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">);<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; gotoLoginScreen();<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br /> <br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">public void </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">gotoRegisterScreen() {<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; getSupportFragmentManager().beginTransaction().replace(R.id.</span><b><i><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">ln_main</span></i></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">, </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">new </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">M001RegisterFragment()).commit();<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br /> <br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">public void </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">gotoLoginScreen() {<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; getSupportFragmentManager().beginTransaction().replace(R.id.</span><b><i><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: #660e7a;">ln_main</span></i></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">, </span><b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: navy;">new </span></b><span style="font-size: 11.0pt; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin; color: black;">M000LoginFragment()).commit();<br /> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br /> }<o:p></o:p></span></pre> <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: .0001pt; line-height: normal;"><b><span style="font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin;">&nbsp;</span></b></p> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">&nbsp;</span></b><b><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">3. Lưu &yacute;:</span></b></span></p> <p><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><!-- [if !supportLists]--><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">-<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Sử dụng đối tượng SharedPreference để thực hiện:<b><o:p></o:p></b></span></span></p> <ul> <li><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%;">Lấy data trong v&ugrave;ng nhớ ri&ecirc;ng của ứng dụng</span></span></li> <li><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Calibri Light','sans-serif'; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Calibri Light'; mso-bidi-theme-font: major-latin;"><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Lưu trữ data account theo cơ chế key-value trong đ&oacute; key l&agrave; <b>email</b>, value l&agrave; </span><b><span style="font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">password.</span></b></span></li> </ul> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Thời gian dự kiến ho&agrave;n th&agrave;nh b&agrave;i n&agrave;y</strong>:&nbsp;<strong>30</strong><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">&nbsp;ph&uacute;t</strong></p> <p style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; vertical-align: baseline;"><em style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;"><strong style="text-rendering: optimizelegibility; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline;">Lưu &yacute;:</strong>&nbsp;Bạn h&atilde;y lưu kết quả lab tr&ecirc;n m&aacute;y t&iacute;nh c&aacute; nh&acirc;n để chuẩn bị cho buổi review sau n&agrave;y. Lưu &yacute; Học vi&ecirc;n cần ho&agrave;n th&agrave;nh tất cả c&aacute;c b&agrave;i lab của m&ocirc;n học mới tiến h&agrave;nh đăng k&yacute; review.</em></p> <div id="eJOY__extension_root" class="eJOY__extension_root_class" style="all: unset;"></div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-vertical" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="VerticalStudentView" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7" data-request-token="f698f0ee297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@aeca91a402bd46b5b8412671fc801a37" data-block-type="vertical"> <h2 class="hd hd-2 unit-title">Tổng kết bài học</h2> <div class="bookmark-button-wrapper"> <button class="btn btn-link bookmark-button " aria-pressed="false" data-bookmark-id="kiendtFX07130,block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@vertical+block@aeca91a402bd46b5b8412671fc801a37" data-bookmarks-api-url="/api/bookmarks/v1/bookmarks/"> <span class="bookmark-text">Bookmark this page</span> </button> </div> <div class="vert-mod"> <div class="vert vert-0" data-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@91292e6631c34a3d8d65fb4f207bc9bd"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-html xmodule_display xmodule_HtmlModule" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="html" data-request-token="f698f0ee297911ecbb0b42010a94000b" data-runtime-version="1" data-usage-id="block-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7+type@html+block@91292e6631c34a3d8d65fb4f207bc9bd" data-type="HTMLModule" data-course-id="course-v1:FUNiX+PRM391x_03-A_VN+2021_T7"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "HTMLModule"} </script> <p style="font-size: 16px;"><strong><span style="color: #0000ff;"><span style="color: #000000;">Tổng kết b&agrave;i học:</span>&nbsp;</span></strong></p> <p style="font-size: 16px;"><span style="color: #000000;">Vậy l&agrave; c&aacute;c bạn đ&atilde; ho&agrave;n th&agrave;nh b&agrave;i học cuối c&ugrave;ng trong chuỗi c&aacute;c b&agrave;i học về lập tr&igrave;nh mobile. B&agrave;i học cuối n&agrave;y l&agrave; sự c&ocirc; đọng c&aacute;c kiến thức trong việc l&agrave;m chủ c&aacute;c ph&acirc;n v&ugrave;ng lưu trữ dữ liệu trong Android, từ đ&oacute; sẽ gi&uacute;p &iacute;ch rất lớn trong qu&aacute; tr&igrave;nh x&acirc;y dựng ứng dụng v&agrave; lưu trữ dữ liệu. Một số kiến thức quan trọng cần điểm qua như sau:</span></p> <ul> <ul> <ul> <li><span style="color: #000000;">C&aacute;c v&ugrave;ng lưu trữ dữ liệu gồm SharePreference, InternalStorage, ExternalStorage</span></li> <li><span style="color: #000000;">Cơ chế đọc - ghi dữ liệu của từng ph&acirc;n v&ugrave;ng</span></li> </ul> </ul> </ul> <p style="font-size: 16px;"><span style="color: #000000;">Một số t&agrave;i liệu để sinh vi&ecirc;n tham khảo th&ecirc;m:</span></p> <ul> <ul> <ul> <li><a href="https://giasutinhoc.vn/labs/lab-android-co-ban/huong-dan-doc-du-lieu-tu-assets-trong-android-2/" target="[object Object]">Đọc dữ liệu từ Asset Android</a></li> <li><a href="https://vntalking.com/huong-dan-room-database-trong-android.html" target="[object Object]">Cơ sở dữ liệu trong android</a></li> </ul> </ul> </ul> <p style="font-size: 16px;"><span style="color: #000000;">Trong qu&aacute; tr&igrave;nh đọc t&agrave;i liệu c&oacute; bất cứ c&acirc;u hỏi n&agrave;o h&atilde;y kết nối với mentor.</span></p> <div id="eJOY__extension_root" class="eJOY__extension_root_class" style="all: unset;"></div> </div> </div> </div> </div>

data-problem-total-possible="1" data-attempts-used="1" data-content=" &lt;h3 class=&#34;hd hd-3 problem-header&#34; id=&#34;f4abb1f0741797fec0f7-problem-title&#34; Lab 7.4 - Thực hiện xử lý logic đăng ký/đăng nhập bằng SharePreference

I. Phạm vi kiến thức vận dụng

  • Nối tiếp bài Lab 7.3 - Xây dựng giao diện đăng nhập đăng ký

II. Nội dung bài thực hành

1. Yêu cầu: Tạo 1 ứng dụng Account và xây dựng giao diện layout sau

        

Mô tả: Đây là 1 giao diện hiển thị thông tin đăng nhập/đăng ký

2. Xây dựng đối tượng xử lý logic

Yêu cầu bắt buộc:

-  Hiển thị các màn hình giao diện bằng Fragment

-  Thực hiện lưu trữ dữ liệu bằng SharedPreference

Bước 1: Xây dựng đối tượng M000LoginFragment để hiển thị giao diện m000_frg_login

  • Hiển thị giao diện login
  • Xử lý logic đăng nhập
  • Di chuyển đến màn hình đăng ký
package com.funix.account;

  

  import android.content.Context;

  import android.content.SharedPreferences;

  import android.os.Bundle;

  import android.view.LayoutInflater;

  import android.view.View;

  import android.view.ViewGroup;

  import android.view.animation.AnimationUtils;

  import android.widget.EditText;

  import android.widget.Toast;

  

  import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;

  

  public class M000LoginFragment extends Fragment implements View.OnClickListener {

    private EditText edtEmail, edtPass;

    private Context mContext;

  

    @Override

    public View onCreateView(LayoutInflater inflater, ViewGroup container, Bundle savedInstanceState) {

        View rootView = inflater.inflate(R.layout.m000_frg_login, container, false);

        initView(rootView);

        return rootView;

    }

  

    @Override

    public void onAttach(Context context) {

        super.onAttach(context);

        mContext = context;

    }

  

    private void initView(View v) {

        edtEmail = v.findViewById(R.id.edt_email);

        edtPass = v.findViewById(R.id.edt_pass);

  

        v.findViewById(R.id.tv_login).setOnClickListener(this);

        v.findViewById(R.id.tv_register).setOnClickListener(this);

    }

  

    @Override

    public void onClick(View v) {

        v.startAnimation(AnimationUtils.loadAnimation(mContext, androidx.appcompat.R.anim.abc_fade_in));

        if (v.getId() == R.id.tv_login) {

            login(edtEmail.getText().toString(), edtPass.getText().toString());

        } else if (v.getId() == R.id.tv_register) {

            gotoRegisterScreen();

        }

    }

  

    private void gotoRegisterScreen() {

        ((MainActivity) mContext).gotoRegisterScreen();

    }

  

    private void login(String mail, String pass) {

        if (mail.isEmpty() || pass.isEmpty()) {

            Toast.makeText(mContext, "Empty value", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();

            return;

        }

  

        SharedPreferences pref = mContext.getSharedPreferences(MainActivity.SAVE_PREF, Context.MODE_PRIVATE);

        String savedPass = pref.getString(mail, null);

        if (savedPass == null) {

            Toast.makeText(mContext, "Email is not existed!", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();

            return;

        }

        if (!pass.equals(savedPass)) {

            Toast.makeText(mContext, "Password is not correct!", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();

            return;

        }

  

        Toast.makeText(mContext, "Login account successfully!", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();

    }

}

 

 Bước 2: Xây dựng đối tượng M001RegisterFragment để hiển thị giao diện m001_frg_register:

  • Hiển thị giao diện register
  • Xử lý logic đăng ký
  • Di chuyển về màn hình đăng nhập
package com.techja.account;

  

  import android.content.Context;

  import android.content.SharedPreferences;

  import android.os.Bundle;

  import android.view.LayoutInflater;

  import android.view.View;

  import android.view.ViewGroup;

  import android.view.animation.AnimationUtils;

  import android.widget.EditText;

  import android.widget.Toast;

  

  import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;

  

  public class M001RegisterFragment extends Fragment implements View.OnClickListener {

    private EditText edtEmail, edtPass, edtRepass;

    private Context mContext;

  

    @Override

    public View onCreateView(LayoutInflater inflater, ViewGroup container, Bundle savedInstanceState) {

        View rootView = inflater.inflate(R.layout.m001_frg_register, container, false);

        initView(rootView);

        return rootView;

    }

  

    @Override

    public void onAttach(Context context) {

        super.onAttach(context);

        mContext = context;

    }

  

    private void initView(View v) {

        edtEmail = v.findViewById(R.id.edt_email);

        edtPass = v.findViewById(R.id.edt_pass);

        edtRepass = v.findViewById(R.id.edt_re_pass);

  

        v.findViewById(R.id.tv_register).setOnClickListener(this);

        v.findViewById(R.id.iv_back).setOnClickListener(this);

    }

  

    @Override

    public void onClick(View v) {

        v.startAnimation(AnimationUtils.loadAnimation(mContext, androidx.appcompat.R.anim.abc_fade_in));

        if (v.getId() == R.id.iv_back) {

            gotoLoginScreen();

        } else if (v.getId() == R.id.tv_register) {

            register(edtEmail.getText().toString(), edtPass.getText().toString(), edtRepass.getText().toString());

        }

    }

  

    private void gotoLoginScreen() {

        ((MainActivity) mContext).gotoLoginScreen();

    }

  

    private void register(String mail, String pass, String repass) {

        if (mail.isEmpty() || pass.isEmpty() || repass.isEmpty()) {

            Toast.makeText(mContext, "Empty value", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();

            return;

        }

        if (!pass.equals(repass)) {

            Toast.makeText(mContext, "Password is not match", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();

        }

  

        SharedPreferences pref = mContext.getSharedPreferences(MainActivity.SAVE_PREF, Context.MODE_PRIVATE);

        String savedPass = pref.getString(mail, null);

        if (savedPass != null) {

            Toast.makeText(mContext, "Email is existed!", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();

            return;

        }

        pref.edit().putString(mail, pass).apply();

        Toast.makeText(mContext, "Register account successfully!", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();

  

        gotoLoginScreen();

    }

}

 

 Bước 3: Xây dựng đối tượng MainActivity để điều khiển các Fragment

package com.techja.account;

  

  import android.os.Bundle;

  

  import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity;

  

  public class MainActivity extends AppCompatActivity {

  

    public static final String SAVE_PREF = "save_pref";

  

    @Override

    protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {

        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);

        setContentView(R.layout.activity_main);

        gotoLoginScreen();

    }

  

    public void gotoRegisterScreen() {

        getSupportFragmentManager().beginTransaction().replace(R.id.ln_main, new M001RegisterFragment()).commit();

    }

  

    public void gotoLoginScreen() {

        getSupportFragmentManager().beginTransaction().replace(R.id.ln_main, new M000LoginFragment()).commit();

    }

}

 

 3. Lưu ý:

-  Sử dụng đối tượng SharedPreference để thực hiện:

  • Lấy data trong vùng nhớ riêng của ứng dụng
  • Lưu trữ data account theo cơ chế key-value trong đó key là email, value là password.

Thời gian dự kiến hoàn thành bài này: 30 phút

Lưu ý: Bạn hãy lưu kết quả lab trên máy tính cá nhân để chuẩn bị cho buổi review sau này. Lưu ý Học viên cần hoàn thành tất cả các bài lab của môn học mới tiến hành đăng ký review.

Lỗi Ask Mentors

Trường hợp bạn gặp vấn đề với chức năng hỏi đáp mentor, vui lòng xem hướng dẫn dưới để xử lý:

A. Trường hợp đã gửi câu hỏi nhưng không tìm được mentor

  1. Vui lòng thử lại sau vài phút, hoặc thử vào giờ trực chính từ 8h-23h. Nếu không được, hãy sang bước 2.
  2. Nhắn hannah phụ trách để được hỗ trợ

B. Trường hợp không thấy mục Ask Mentors hoặc không thấy hiện ra đầy đủ nội dung nhập câu hỏi

  1. Vui lòng nhấn F5 sau vài phút. Nếu không được, hãy sang bước 2
  2. Nhắn hannah phụ trách để được hỗ trợ
